memberSignatures.value: public Delegate BuildDelegate (Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<ValueTuple<Type,Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema>,Delegate> cache);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Delegate BuildDelegate(class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<class System.Type, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema>, class System.Delegate> cache) cil managed

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.summary: The resolution to obtain type information from.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to map to the type.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
A delegate cache. If a delegate is cached for a specific type-schema pair, that delegate
            will be returned for all subsequent occurrences of the pair.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a serializer for a type-schema pair.
